title: Bug 17825 ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825 ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, the system emits a windows 'ding' sound (the bell sound that indicates an error or incorrect action).
EB: I expect that selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText should not trigger any system beep or error sound.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the ControlExampleText.
2. Choose the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Observe the system emitting a windows 'ding' sound.
